hero.title: The most powerful oracle, provably
hero.description: Enjoy Smart, Neutral and Secure Data

what-is-witnet.title: Witnet 2.0, the Oracle for a Censorship-Resistant Future
what-is-witnet.description: Without a dependable oracle, smart contracts are susceptible to security breaches, manipulation, and financial losses. Witnet employs advanced cryptographic and Proof of Stake (PoS) economic mechanisms, ensuring that your smart contracts receive secure and trustworthy data inputs.

coin.title: Stake! Secure the Network, Earn Rewards!
coin.description: Secure the network, earn rewards. Witnet 2.0 is unstoppable.

build-section.title: Why is Witnet great for building?
build-section.description-1: Witnet provides a straightforward way for smart contracts to interact with external data sources. This is crucial for applications that need to process real-world information, like prices, weather reports, or the results of events.
build-section.description-2: The decentralized nature of Witnet ensures that data is not in control of a single entity, reducing the risks of manipulation or single points of failure. This increases the security and reliability of the applications built on it.
build-section.description-3: Witnetâ€™s compatibility with multiple blockchain platforms means that builders are not restricted to a single blockchain. This allows for the creation of cross-chain applications and services.
build-section.description-4: Builders can source data from a variety of external sources, giving them the flexibility to choose the most relevant and reliable data for their applications.
build-section.description-5: The tokenomics of Witnet incentivize nodes to provide accurate data, as they are rewarded for their honest services and penalized for dishonesty. This mechanism promotes a high level of data integrity.
build-section.description-6: Builders benefit from the community and resources provided by Witnet, including documentation, developer tools, and support from other community members.

explore.title: Explore the Power of Witnet
explore.description: Dive into datasets and detailed insights by navigating through transparent data effortlessly.

explorer-1.title: Data Feeds
explorer-1.description: The Data Feeds Explorer showcases a range of public data feeds, freely accessible to all developers and maintained by the Witnet Foundation on multiple blockchains.

explorer-2.title: Block Explorer
explorer-2.description: The witnet.network block explorer gives you a transparent view into all the transactions and data requests in the Witnet blockchain.

community.title: Community
community.description: From developers to miners and enthusiasts, the Witnet community prides itself on always being welcoming, discussing the things that really matter, and ensuring that Witnet plays a key role in the foundations of Web3.
